ARABIC: وَصَدَّهَا مَا كَانَت تَّعْبُدُ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ إِنَّهَا كَانَتْ مِن قَوْمٍ كَٰفِرِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: but what she worshipped besides Allah impeded her. She was from an unbelieving people.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: She was (in fact) turned away by what she worshipped other than God, for she came of an unbelieving people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: What prevented her (from accepting the True Faith) was her worshipping deities other than Allah, for she belonged to an unbelieving people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Her idols prevented her from believing in God and she was an infidel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And the thing she used to worship instead of Allah prevented her; she was indeed from the disbelieving people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And Saddaha that which she used to worship besides Allah has prevented her (from Islam), for she was of a disbelieving people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And what she worshipped besides Allah prevented her, surely she was of an unbelieving people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: but that she served, apart from God, barred her, for she was of a people of unbelievers.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And (all) that she was wont to worship instead of Allah hindered her, for she came of disbelieving folk.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: And that which she used to worship beside God had stopped her [from believing]; for she came of a disbelieving people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And that which she was wont to worship instead of Allah hindered her; verily she was of an infidel people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: She had been barred [from the way of Allah] by what she used to worship besides Allah, for she belonged to a faithless people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And he diverted her from the worship of others besides Allah: for she was (sprung) of a people that had no faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And that which she used to worship besides Allah has prevented her (from Islam), for she was of a disbelieving people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: That which she worshipped, other than Allah, had prevented her, for she came from an unbelieving nation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But she was prevented by what she worshiped besides God; she belonged to a disbelieving people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And that which she was worshipping other than Allah had averted her [from submission to Him]. Indeed, she was from a disbelieving people."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [27:43] And what she worshipped besides God, that is, other than Him, barred her, from the worship of God, for she belonged to disbelieving folk’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And (all) that she was wont to worship) the sun (instead of Allah hindered her) Solomon stopped her; it is also said that this means: Allah stopped her, (for she came of disbelieving folk) her folk were Zoroastrians.
